title: Ep. 706 Did Mueller Find Something?
description:
Summary:
Did Bob Mueller find something so destructive to the Democrats that he had to refer it for investigation? In today’s episode I address the explosive revelations yesterday that were largely ignored by the media, but are beginning to paint a devastating picture of the attack on Trump. 
 
News Picks:
Today’s edition of liberal myth-busting: “Does the minimum wage reduce poverty?”
 
This article about the raid on Paul Manafort’s House has some explosive revelations.
 
Why did an Obama attorney who was working with Paul Manafort suddenly resign from his law firm?
 
Is former FBI Deputy Director McCabe going to cooperate with the government misconduct investigation?
 
Another Hillary scheme exposed.
 
A stunning announcement by Jeff Sessions yesterday seems to contradict the Democrats’ “collusion” narrative. 
 
Liberals double down on their attacks on religion. 
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.

In today’s episode I address the explosive revelations yesterday that were largely ignored by the media, but are beginning to paint a devastating picture of the attack on Trump.    News Picks: Today’s edition of liberal myth-busting: “Does the minimum wage reduce poverty?”   This article about the raid on Paul Manafort’s House has some explosive revelations.   Why did an Obama attorney who was working with Paul Manafort suddenly resign from his law firm?   Is former FBI Deputy Director McCabe going to cooperate with the government misconduct investigation?   Another Hillary scheme exposed.   A stunning announcement by Jeff Sessions yesterday seems to contradict the Democrats’ “collusion” narrative.    Liberals double down on their attacks on religion.    Copyright CRTV.
